title: Encode-iary
description: A C program that allows users to create journal entries without having to worry about its contents' safety.

title: Pitakaibigan
description: A website for a social advocacy that thrives for financial literacy awareness for the young adults living in the Philippines.

title: KCO Inventory System
description: An inventory system for a Kangkong Chips business. This is a school project for Object-Oriented Programming.
